availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Meade County, Kentucky, cooper. Kentucky native. Married to Elinor Anderson Neafus in Meade County, Kentucky, on May 7, 1822. Father of Anderson Neafus, Susan Neafus, and George Neafus. Cooper in Meade County, Kentucky, in 1850. Cooper in Meade County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Meade County, Kentucky, p. 210B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Meade County, Brandenburg, p. 375.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Meade County Marriages, Film 001929414, p. .
